Primary Contact: Leanna Kohnke, Regional Coordinator; Email: Leanna.Kohnke@justiceeducation.ca
Service Details: - Creates innovative programs and resources that improve access to BCs justice system for the general public, teachers, youth, persons with disabilities, Aboriginals and immigrants in BC to help them better understand how our justice system works and how to resolve their legal matters- Most programs and resources are available free of charge and can be accessed through the website
